Study Abstract : This trial study Gulf War era veteran unexplained chronic medical symptom pain , fatigue , and/or cognitive difficulty . Treatment give three month group format . The CBT exercise group meet one hour , week 12 week total 12 hourly session . The intervention standardize investigator train use method prior start trial .
